questions.question: What is the predominant color of the supplement bottle's body?
What material appears to compose the bottle?
What is the general shape of the container holding the supplement?
What color is the cap or lid on top of the bottle?
What type of label is predominantly visible on the bottle?
What is the overall texture of the bottle's surface?
Is the printing on the bottle primarily in uppercase or lowercase letters?
What is the apparent finish of the plastic used for the bottle?
Does the bottle have a tamper-evident feature indicated on the label?
What is the orientation of the label text on the side of the bottle?
What kind of markings are visible beneath the main label?
What does the visible GMP symbol indicate about this product?
Does the visible label list the product's ingredient?
Is there visible seal around the cap-bottle juncture?
What is the print size of the text on the nutritional label?
